verses.t: In the end{G3796} of the sabbath{G4521}, as it began to dawn{G2020} toward{G1519} the first{G1520} day of the week{G4521}, came{G2064} Mary{G3137} Magdalene{G3588} and{G2532} the other{G243} Mary{G3137} to see{G2334} the sepulchre{G3588}.

And{G2532}, behold{G2400}, there was{G1096} a{G4578} great{G3173} earthquake{G4578}: for{G1063} the angel{G32} of the Lord{G2962} descended{G2597} from{G1537} heaven{G3772}, and came{G4334} and rolled back{G617} the stone{G3588} from{G575} the door{G3588}, and{G2532} sat{G2521} upon{G1883} it{G846}.
His{G846} countenance{G3588} was{G2258} like{G5613} lightning{G796}, and{G2532} his{G846} raiment{G3588} white{G3022} as{G5616} snow{G5510}:
And{G1161} for{G575} fear{G3588} of him{G846} the keepers{G5083} did shake{G4579}, and{G2532} became{G1096} as{G5616} dead{G3498} men.

And{G1161} the angel{G3588} answered{G611} and said{G2036} unto the women{G3588}, Fear{G5399} not{G3361} ye{G5210}: for{G1063} I know{G1492} that{G3754} ye seek{G2212} Jesus{G2424}, which was crucified{G4717}.
He is{G2076} not{G3756} here{G5602}: for{G1063} he is risen{G1453}, as{G2531} he said{G2036}. Come{G1205}, see{G1492} the place{G3588} where{G3699} the Lord{G3588} lay{G2749}.

And{G2532} go{G4198} quickly{G5035}, and tell{G2036} his{G846} disciples{G3588} that{G3754} he is risen{G1453} from{G575} the dead{G3498}; and{G2532}, behold{G2400}, he goeth before{G4254} you{G5209} into{G1519} Galilee{G3588}; there{G1563} shall ye see{G3700} him{G846}: lo{G2400}, I have told{G2036} you{G5213}.

And{G2532} they departed{G1831} quickly{G5035} from{G575} the sepulchre{G3588} with{G3326} fear{G5401} and{G2532} great{G3173} joy{G5479}; and did run{G5143} to bring{G518} his{G846} disciples{G3588} word{G518}.

And{G1161} as{G5613} they went{G4198} to tell{G518} his{G846} disciples{G3588}, behold{G2400}, Jesus{G3588} met{G528} them{G846}, saying{G3004}, All hail{G5463}. And{G1161} they came{G4334} and held{G2902} him{G846} by the feet{G3588}, and{G2532} worshipped{G4352} him{G846}.

Then{G5119} said{G3004} Jesus{G3588} unto them{G846}, Be{G5399} not{G3361} afraid{G5399}: go{G5217} tell{G518} my{G3450} brethren{G3588} that{G2443} they go{G565} into{G1519} Galilee{G3588}, and there{G2546} shall they see{G3700} me{G3165}.

Now{G1161} when{G4198} they{G846} were going{G4198}, behold{G2400}, some{G5100} of the watch{G3588} came{G2064} into{G1519} the city{G3588}, and shewed{G518} unto the chief priests{G3588} all{G537} the things that were done{G1096}.
And{G2532} when they were assembled{G4863} with{G3326} the elders{G4245}, and{G5037} had taken{G2983} counsel{G4824}, they gave{G1325} large{G2425} money{G694} unto the soldiers{G3588},
Saying{G3004}, Say ye{G2036}, His{G846} disciples{G3588} came{G2064} by night{G3571}, and stole{G2813} him{G846} away while{G2837} we{G2257} slept{G2837}.
And{G2532} if{G1437} this{G5124} come{G191} to{G1909} the governor's{G3588} ears{G191}, we{G2249} will persuade{G3982} him{G846}, and{G2532} secure{G275} you{G5209}

So{G1161} they{G3588} took{G2983} the money{G3588}, and did{G4160} as{G5613} they were taught{G1321}: and{G2532} this{G3778} saying{G3588} is commonly reported{G1310} among{G3844} the Jews{G2453} until{G3360} this day{G4594}.
Then{G1161} the{G3101} eleven{G1733} disciples{G3101} went away{G4198} into{G1519} Galilee{G3588}, into{G1519} a mountain{G3588} where{G3757} Jesus{G3588} had appointed{G5021} them{G846}.
And{G2532} when they saw{G1492} him{G846}, they worshipped{G4352} him{G846}: but{G1161} some{G3588} doubted{G1365}.
And{G2532} Jesus{G3588} came{G4334} and spake{G2980} unto them{G846}, saying{G3004}, All{G3956} power{G1849} is given{G1325} unto me{G3427} in{G1722} heaven{G3772} and{G2532} in{G1909} earth{G1093}.

Go ye{G4198} therefore{G3767}, and teach{G3100} all{G3956} nations{G3588}, baptizing{G907} them{G846} in{G1519} the name{G3588} of the Father{G3588}, and{G2532} of the Son{G3588}, and{G2532} of the{G4151} Holy{G40} Ghost{G4151}:

Teaching{G1321} them{G846} to observe{G5083} all things{G3956} whatsoever{G3745} I have commanded{G1781} you{G5213}: and{G2532}, lo{G2400}, I{G1473} am{G1510} with{G3326} you{G5216} alway{G3956}, even unto{G2193} the end{G3588} of the world{G3588}. Amen{G281}.
